Contributor: Benda, Wladyslaw T. (Wladyslaw Theodore), 1873-, artist.; American National Red Cross, publisher.; Alco-Gravure, printer;
Note: Signed "W.T. Benda."  Date based on America's participation in the war.                  Orientation:  Vertical.
Description: Text says that you can help in the war by helping the Red Cross. Illustration shows a woman knitting. The symbol of the Red Cross is in the upper left corner.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: You can help
